Html:
hi Marteen,

I try to install Phpexcel with Windows 2003 Server. Only version 1.6.0 works (the version without IOFactory.php file). If I try another version (with iofactory.php), nothing happens.
I think I have forgotten something but what...

My configuration : php 5.2.0 with php_zip.dll v5.2.5.5 and php_dom.xml 5.2.1.1

Thanks for your help.

Laurent
Can you try using error reporting E_ALL?

hi maarten,

it works : the user apache haven't the rights to write to the phpexcel folder.

thanks a lot.

Laurent
